alert.note: Alert for Chattooga; Dade; Floyd; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 3:27AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Floyd, southern Walker, south central Dade and northern Chattooga Counties through 400 AM EDT... At 327 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Center Post, or 8 miles southwest of Lafayette, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Trion, La Fayette, Center Post, Subligna, Suttles Mill, Everett Springs and Lake Marvin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
